    columns=None,
    aggfunc="mean",
    fill_value=None,
    margins=False,
    dropna=True,

    observed=False,
) -> "DataFrame":

        agged = agged.dropna(how="all")

        # Corrected code for accessing columns' attribute

            if (
                v in data
                and pd.api.types.is_integer_dtype(data[v])
                and v in agged
                and not pd.api.types.is_integer_dtype(agged[v])
            ):

    # The block where the error was occurring
